org.block.serializtion

Interface ConfigImplementation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JSONConfigImplementation

    public interface ConfigImplementation
    This is all the global settings for loading and saving from a particular implementation of structured file

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static JSONConfigImplementation JSON
      Easy access to the implementation for manipulation of JSON files

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConfigNode createEmptyNode()
      Creates a empty root node for creation of the structured file
      default ConfigNode load(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Loads the root node of the provided structured file.
      ConfigNode load(java.lang.String structure)
      Loads the root node of the provided text from the structured file.
      java.lang.String write(ConfigNode node)
      Writes the structured contents as a String treating the provided node as the root
      default java.lang.String write(ConfigNode node, java.nio.file.Path path)
      Writes the structured contents as a File treating the provided node as the root

    • Field Detail

      • JSON

        static final JSONConfigImplementation JSON
        Easy access to the implementation for manipulation of JSON files

    • Method Detail

      • createEmptyNode

        ConfigNode createEmptyNode()
        Creates a empty root node for creation of the structured file
        Returns:
        An empty node at the root

      • load

        ConfigNode load(java.lang.String structure)
        Loads the root node of the provided text from the structured file. This is useful for if the file was provided from a abnormal location such as user inputted text
        Parameters:
        structure - the text of the structured file
        Returns:
        The root node

      • write

        java.lang.String write(ConfigNode node)
        Writes the structured contents as a String treating the provided node as the root
        Parameters:
        node - The provided node
        Returns:
        The outputting structured text
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the provided node isn't of the correct implementation

      • load

        default ConfigNode load(java.nio.file.Path path)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the root node of the provided structured file.
        Parameters:
        path - The Path to the file
        Returns:
        The Root node
        Throws:
        java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException - If the file does not exist
        java.io.IOException - error reading file

      • write

        default java.lang.String write(ConfigNode node,
                               java.nio.file.Path path)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the structured contents as a File treating the provided node as the root
        Parameters:
        node - The provided node
        path - The provided file
        Returns:
        The outputting structured text
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the provided node isn't of the correct implementation
        java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException - If the file does not exist
        java.io.IOException - error reading file
